product_name: Serfas USB Silicone Front Bike Light
long_description: Serfas USB Slicone front bike light is a simple lighting solution that mounts to your handlebar and recharges via USB port, making it great for commuting or everyday riding. Soft, flexible silicone body offers water-resistant performance and features an integrated mounting strap for easy attachment to your handlebar. Single white LED can be cycled between high, low and flashing modes let you tailor the light as you need it; maximum output of 25 lumens. Rechargeable battery offers up to 8 hrs. of flashing use (3 hrs. on high); charge indicator lets you know when it's time to recharge. Simply plug the Serfas USB Slicone Front bike light into a USB port and it will recharge within 2.5 hrs.
